en-US.name: Science Pack
en-US.summary: The science pack is a great addition because you will hear facts about science.
en-US.description: The science pack expands the set of facts shared with you to include facts about science.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The science pack adds over 10 science facts into the set of facts randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the science pack.  You now have access to science facts!

testingInstructions: <TESTING INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE CERTIFICATION TEAM SO THEY KNOW HOW TO PURCHASE AND USE THIS PRODUCT>
